name: Christmas Candy Match Mania - Santa's Festive Holiday Connect FREE!
name_original: Christmas Candy Match Mania - Santa's Festive Holiday Connect FREE!
description: Jump into puzzle fun with this Christmas puzzle game.  Drag your finger to connect the same colored Christmas items.  Try to get the biggest chain you can for maximum points.  Hurry up, Time is running out. Massively addicting.  It's free so grab it today.
